content: this pattern is available in english us crochet terms skill level easy size 22 cm 8 in if using bulky weight yarn bulky 7 wpi 5 bulky and sport weight yarn sport 12 wpi 2 fine material yarn plush - yarnart dolce or vizell baby smile purple 80 g pink 5 g hook 4 5 mm glitter plastic eyes 20 mm soft stuffing scissors pins for sewing the parts at the right spot needle for sewing for the plush yarn pattern exists only in electronic form the pdf file contains a textual instruction of crochet and accompanying photos main steps of work after purchasing this file you ll see a link to the page of the file by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use 1 this pattern is for personal use only 2 it is prohibited to reproduce copy publish or distribute this pattern its parts or photos in any way or form including translations into foreign languages 3 it is allowed to publish photos of the finished items sell the finished items indicating the pattern s author tatiana kucherovska tanaticrochet
